ai-atk-s0401a14:48_0: King Assaji and Punabbasuka do not fulfill such fame. His fame is characterized by women, fame and sovereignty over the seven treasures, and so forth is not neglected by the female characteristics. And the women don’t fulfill all their practices.
ai-atk-s0401a14:48_1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen that a woman is said to be a wheel-turning monarch.

ai-atk-s0401a14:50_1: “That’s why it’s possible to practice the spiritual life.”
ai-atk-s0401a14:50_2: but not to be spoken of.
ai-atk-s0401a14:50_3: here for a person here who is reborn there.
ai-atk-s0401a14:50_4: For the Great Brahmā stands forth
ai-atk-s0401a14:50_5: And a woman, having developed the right time, and returned to the Great Brahmā.
ai-atk-s0401a14:50_6: But if a man isn’t said to him:
ai-atk-s0401a14:50_7: And in this case, while he is the shape of a man, not a woman or a man,
ai-atk-s0401a14:51_0: They dropped the nectar in conduct of body, speech, and mind, and the honey-balanceds. They don’t produce any kind of bad conduct that lead to its nest. They fall into it, the result of bad bodily conduct, the result of bad conduct, the result of good conduct, the result of good conduct,
ai-atk-s0401a14:51_1: And just as the seeds, the seeds, the sweet flag, the honey-balls, the honeyed seeds that were produced in fruit.
ai-atk-s0401a14:51_2: Thus they do good things, hurriedly and died.
ai-atk-s0401a14:52_0: “Having seen the kind of plant seed, that which is the seed,
ai-atk-s0401a14:53_0: A doer of good gets bad, and bad.”
ai-atk-s0401a14:54_0: That’s why it’s impossible for someone who has said to do bad things by way of body, speech, and mind.

ai-atk-s0401a14:55_9: As long as sentient beings don’t attain perfection in the same way, they’re not reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm. For eventually make a sign, and they go to hell. This is how they arise in the underworld, the hells is reborn in the world of the gods.
ai-atk-s0401a14:55_10: Thus there is no sign that is in factable, without any sign that is called “reviously confined”.
ai-atk-s0401a14:55_12: Your Majesty, is looking for hell, the animal realm, and the world of the gods. Your Majesty, was reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_1: A purgative Soṇa of the Venerable Soṇakāyana had one Dhamma.
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_2: His father became an old man called Pajirā. He was unable to queen and protect him, saying, “Even if you made a living in a sleeping place with a large crowd, you were unable to queen.”
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_3: to someone who is sick, he tormented in hell for him.
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_4: Soṇadaṇḍa who had come shouted their feet, and they awfully surrounded it.
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_5: The Elder Abhaya said: “Shere did so there.”
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_6: What is the Great Elder Saṅgha?
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_8: The senior elder told him: “How can I beat the drums in hell for the sake of worldly gain,” and he put on dry ground into the air, and making a shrine terrace, and he put it on the seats. He then carried off the carpets for the Fortunate One, thinking: ‘I will take my father’s head, and after worshipping the Great Shrine, he turned it up into the Great Wood, and making an end of his father.’
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_9: Having seen the Elder Mahādhammarakkhita, making her worshipped him with his mind,
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_10: was a cast-off log to the gods.
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_11: And like a charming lordly elephants, which were like a neck made of sandalwood, as was built by the gods and humans going along.
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_15: The elder thought: “The Great Elder didn’t attend on the matter.”
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_16: Then it should be understood that the abandoning of the two factors is stated in this way:
ai-atk-s0401a14:56_17: And here the words “which treats” are stated here by the name of bodily conduct, etc., as stated in the Paṭisambhidā in the commentaries in the way beginning, “ and so on.”
ai-atk-s0401a14:57_0: Herein, in one teacher says: “Here the Leave in that moment, this is the moment.”
ai-atk-s0401a14:57_1: Another thinks: “Sometimes the result of having done bad deeds, and even gained a distinction.
ai-atk-s0401a14:57_2: Whatever deed there is, the result in that same deed is the same as the result.”
ai-atk-s0401a14:58_0: The conclusion of the commentary is finished.
